Welcome

My name is Justin Garcia am I am a self taught front end web developer based in Albuquerque, NM. Through online tutorials, books, and friends I have created this website to show what I can do.

Through the generosity of online tutors, I have been able to pursue my passion in coding. Please feel free to look around, and if you would like to talk more, contact me through the contact form on the contact tab. Thank you.


About Me

Throughout my studies I have become proficient in: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JS, and jQuery. I am hard at work at learning more libraires for JS sush as React.js and Vue.js, with the goal of learning PHP and SQL to becoming a full stack developer.


Work

These are the projects I have worked on to demonstrate my previously listed skills, below you will find the project name and focused language, a brief description, and then links to either the code posted on my Github account or a demonstration of the project.

Responsive Email

Lynda.com provided a tutorial for this template. I am comfortable sending responsive emails using tables across multiple platforms.

The biggest challenge from this project was the hard coding. Not having a seperate css page made it hard to navigate the page which made finding errors difficult. Utlizing a markup validator on validator.w3.org help identify missed details.
